#Text=Deadly fire below US President 's Trump Tower residence
#Text=Tuesday , April 10 , 2018
#Text=Trump Tower in New York City .
#Text=Image : David Shankbone .

#Text=On Saturday , the Trump Tower , in Midtown , New York City , caught fire shortly before 18:00 EST ( 2200 UTC ) on the 50th floor , claiming the life of a 67-year-old resident , Todd Brassner , who lived in apartment 50C .
#Text=All other residents were evacuated without incident .
#Text=During the fire , six firefighters received non-life-threatening burns and other minor injuries .
#Text=Neither US President Donald Trump nor the First Family were in the building at the time of the fire .
#Text=The high-end Fifth Avenue address is the personal residence of President Donald Trump , whose family occupies the top three stories of the 58-story building .

#Text=The US Secret Service maintains a constant security presence inside the building with the New York City Police Department guarding a hard perimeter , intended to stop vehicular attacks , and a soft perimeter , intended for on-foot attacks .
#Text=The four-alarm fire required 200 firemen , extra police , and paramedics .
#Text=At 20:00 EST ( 0000 UTC Sunday ) , the New York City Fire Department ( FDNY ) declared the fire was under control .
#Text=Trump tweeted , " Firemen ( and women ) did a great job .
